Title: Sports Medicine
Plot: A severely broken arm reveals a bizarre case of bone loss and ends the comeback plans of major league pitcher Hank Wiggen. House suspects Hank is lying about using steroids, as his condition worsens. When Hank's kidneys start to fail, his wife offers to donate hers, but she would have to abort her early pregnancy. Forced into an impossible solution, and admitting failure as an addict, Hank tries to take his own life. House and his team must isolate and fix the problem soon if this pitcher's life
GuestStars: Scott Foley, Bryan Singer, Meredith Monroe, Art LaFleur, Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Deirdre M. Smith, Timothy McNeil, Sean Everett, Richard Swaidan
